title: Shriram Transport Finance approves fund raising of Rs 77.7 cr - Business Standard
content: Shriram Transport Finance approves fund raising of Rs 77.7 cr  Business Standard
description: The NBFC on Friday announced that it has approved and allotted senior secured rated, listed, principal protected market linked, redeemable, Non-Convertible Debentures (NCDs) on private placement basis.
